verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> toward the children of Ammon, <S%H1121><s%> and prophesy against them: <S%H5012><s%>

and tell <S%H559><s%> the children of Ammon, <S%H1121><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H136><s%> Because you said, <S%H559><s%> Aha, <S%H1889><s%> against my sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> when it was profaned; <S%H2490><s%> and against the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when it was made desolate; <S%H8074><s%> and against the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> when they went <S%H1980><s%> into captivity: <S%H1473><s%>

therefore, <S%H5414><s%> behold, I will deliver you to the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%> for a possession, <S%H4181><s%> and they shall set <S%H3427><s%> their encampments <S%H2918><s%> in you, <S%H5414><s%> and make their dwellings <S%H4908><s%> in you; <S%H398><s%> they shall eat your fruit, <S%H6529><s%> and they shall drink <S%H8354><s%> your milk. <S%H2461><s%>

I will make <S%H5414><s%> Rabbah <S%H7237><s%> a stable <S%H5116><s%> for camels, <S%H1581><s%> and the children of Ammon <S%H1121><s%> a resting place <S%H4769><s%> for flocks: <S%H6629><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> Because you have clapped <S%H4222><s%> your hands, <S%H3027><s%> and stamped <S%H7554><s%> with the feet, <S%H7272><s%> and rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> with all the despite <S%H7589><s%> of your soul <S%H5315><s%> against the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

therefore, <S%H5186><s%> behold, I have stretched out my hand <S%H3027><s%> on you, <S%H5414><s%> and will deliver you for a spoil <S%H957><s%> to the nations; <S%H1471><s%> and I will cut you off <S%H3772><s%> from the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and I will cause you to perish <S%H6><s%> out of the countries: <S%H776><s%> I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> you; <S%H3045><s%> and you shall know that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> and Seir <S%H8165><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H1004><s%> the house of Judah <S%H3063><s%> is like all the nations; <S%H1471><s%>

therefore, <S%H6605><s%> behold, I will open the side <S%H3802><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> from the cities, <S%H5892><s%> from his cities <S%H5892><s%> which are on his frontiers, <S%H7097><s%> the glory <S%H6643><s%> of the country, <S%H776><s%> Beth Jeshimoth, <S%H1020><s%> Baal Meon, <S%H1186><s%> and Kiriathaim, <S%H7156><s%>

to the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east, <S%H6924><s%> to go against the children of Ammon; <S%H1121><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> them for a possession, <S%H4181><s%> that the children of Ammon <S%H1121><s%> may not be remembered <S%H2142><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
and I will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on Moab; <S%H4124><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Because Edom <S%H123><s%> has dealt <S%H6213><s%> against the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> by taking <S%H5358><s%> vengeance, <S%H5359><s%> and has greatly <S%H816><s%> offended, <S%H816><s%> and revenged himself on them; <S%H5358><s%>

therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> on Edom, <S%H123><s%> and will cut off <S%H3772><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and animal <S%H929><s%> from it; <S%H5414><s%> and I will make it desolate <S%H2723><s%> from Teman; <S%H8487><s%> even to Dedan <S%H1719><s%> shall they fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

I will lay <S%H5414><s%> my vengeance <S%H5360><s%> on Edom <S%H123><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and they shall do <S%H6213><s%> in Edom <S%H123><s%> according to my anger <S%H639><s%> and according to my wrath; <S%H2534><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> my vengeance, <S%H5360><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Because the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> have dealt <S%H6213><s%> by revenge, <S%H5360><s%> and have taken <S%H5358><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> with despite <S%H7589><s%> of soul <S%H5315><s%> to destroy <S%H4889><s%> with perpetual <S%H5769><s%> enmity; <S%H342><s%>

therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H5186><s%> I will stretch out my hand <S%H3027><s%> on the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the Cherethites, <S%H3774><s%> and destroy <S%H6><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> coast. <S%H2348><s%>

I will execute <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> vengeance <S%H5360><s%> on them with wrathful <S%H2534><s%> rebukes; <S%H8433><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I shall lay <S%H5414><s%> my vengeance on them. <S%H5360><s%>
